name: widgets.PageStorageBucket

methods.name: readState
methods.desc:
Read given data from into this page storage bucket using the specified identifier or an identifier computed from the given context. The computed identifier is based on the PageStorageKeys found in the path from context to the PageStorage widget that owns this page storage bucket.

If an explicit identifier is not provided and no PageStorageKeys are found, then null is returned.
methods.example:
Implementation

dynamic readState(BuildContext context, { Object identifier }) {
  if (_storage == null)
    return null;
  if (identifier != null)
    return _storage[identifier];
  final _StorageEntryIdentifier contextIdentifier = _computeIdentifier(context);
  return contextIdentifier.isNotEmpty ? _storage[contextIdentifier] : null;
}

methods.name: writeState
methods.desc:
Write the given data into this page storage bucket using the specified identifier or an identifier computed from the given context. The computed identifier is based on the PageStorageKeys found in the path from context to the PageStorage widget that owns this page storage bucket.

If an explicit identifier is not provided and no PageStorageKeys are found, then the data is not saved.
methods.example:
Implementation

void writeState(BuildContext context, dynamic data, { Object identifier }) {
  _storage ??= <Object, dynamic>{};
  if (identifier != null) {
    _storage[identifier] = data;
  } else {
    final _StorageEntryIdentifier contextIdentifier = _computeIdentifier(context);
    if (contextIdentifier.isNotEmpty)
      _storage[contextIdentifier] = data;
  }
}

desc:
A storage bucket associated with a page in an app.

Useful for storing per-page state that persists across navigations from one page to another.
